roleset.name: wring hands

role.descr: cause of handwringing, thing handwringed over

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT Phase 1, Part 3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All args
example.text: ...while you handwring about your typical bourgeois woes and sovereignty.
example.arg: about your typical bourgeois woes and sovereignity.

example.name: Adjectival Usage
example.text: Why is it therefore that some handwringing Bishops and lefty lords are trying to wreck the bill by insisting that Child Benefit should be paid in addition to the cap ?
